channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟢 16:03 Driven anxiety in the Chernihiv region.Creck on subsequent messages.
item.description: 🟢 16:03 Driven anxiety in the Chernihiv region.Creck on subsequent messages.#Chernihiv_e This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
